biotools.summary:
An integrative single-cell RNA-Seq interpretation system for functional gene module analysis.

---Integrative scRNA-Seq Interpretation System for Functional Gene Module analysis.

Single-cell RNA-Seq data is useful in discovering cell heterogeneity and signature genes in specific cell populations in cancer and other complex diseases.
